data.text:
Lovely hotel, staff couldn't have worked harder. Buffet very good, lots of choice and always changing. Food always hot, plates cleared quickly. A la carte restaurants not to our liking surprisingly. The italian restaurant had a set menu so no choice what to eat, others were similar. Pools were good, lots of choice and normally sunbeds available. Entertainment staff interacted and were very friendly without being over pushy. Lots of evening entertainment, and a sports bar on site. All very clean , room we had was for 3 and was plenty big enough. 
Would recommend, only downside is other annoying English tourists, but thats not the hotels fault!!
data.title: Great week in Rhodes

data.text:
Stayed at Akti imperial as a package holiday all inclusive. I'm quite happy with the  hotel.  We had a room with balcony overlooking the sea which was amazing. Room was clean, tea and coffee making facilities. Mini bar refilled promptly every day. Towels a bit on a gray side, not 5 star standard. Staff generally very friendly. Special thanks to front of House guest services. Restaurant with many options. Variety of foods available, buffet refilled instantly with fresh foods. Staff should really be recognised for good work,  not easy in this massive 700 bedrooms hotel. Few pools with bars, private beach with easy access. Food and drink available all the time. 
Used fish spa wich was amazing. Not used the spa facilities or indoor pool. Daughter pleased with hotel gym.  Local tax of 10 euro per room per day took us by a surprise, I imagine it is the rate around Rhodes. 
I would say solid 4star rather than 5 advertised by our travel agent but we had very pleasant experience.  Highly recommended.
data.title: Very pleasant experience

data.text:
I came here with my boyfriend for 1 week on the 3rd April and we couldn’t wait to get back home. 

ROOM
On arrival our room had a strange musty smell and the lamp shades were wonky and broken. Our TV was in Romanian and ended up not working which we made reception aware of and they did not fix. The skirting boards are lifting and the floor was dirty and the towels were frayed and had stains on. Aircon doesn’t work and everytime we showered the drain lifts off. 

FACILITIES 
Definitely not enough sunbeds. This was easter half term and it was extremely busy so i cannot imagine what it’s like in summer. The staff don’t seem to know anything. There was a bingo poster with little information so we went and asked multiple staff and they all said they don’t know. 

FOOD
Food was quite good, lots of options however the waiters/waitresses are constantly hovering and the queues for food is a joke. On the plus side there is food 24/7 which is nice, and the crepes are really yummy. 

Overall we felt super unwelcomed and everyone is just a bit rude. A 3 star at most!
data.title: 3rd - 10th April                  Defo not a 5 star!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest ,

Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. 
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced with your room. 
Please rest assured that we take guest feedback very seriously, and we are committed to resolving this issue promptly.
Could you please provide us with more details at  the guest relation  desk , about the specific issues you encountered with your room? 
We want to understand the situation fully so that we can address it effectively and ensure that you have a comfortable and enjoyable stay with us.
In the meantime, if there is anything immediate we can do to improve your current situation or make your stay more comfortable, please don't hesitate to let us know. 
Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we are here to assist you in any way we can.
We appreciate your comment regarding the food and crepes  . 
Once again, we apologize for any inconvenience caused, and we appreciate your patience and understanding as we work to resolve this matter.

Warm regards
Stella Chatzikonstantinou
Public Relations Manager
owner_response.author: Public Relations

data.text: Unfortunately not a 5 star hotel. The food is good and varied but that’s it. We didn’t use the pools as not very welcoming. Heated pool is freezing cold with water coming out of the showers to fill it?! The bedroom had a nice view of the sea but a very busy main road in between. Very noisy, and very busy and was only, luckily I only stayed 3 nights don’t think I could stay any longer. Rhodes is beautiful and there are nice hotels but not this one.
data.title: Not for me

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
DearJoanaa209 

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and on TripAdvisor.  
As we already have informed you in another platform where you wrote your review , We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Your comments are invaluable to us as we continuously strive to improve our services. Please rest assured that we take your feedback seriously and will address the issues you've raised. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future and provide you with a more enjoyable experience.

Warm regards, 
Stella Chatzikonstantinou
owner_response.author: Public Relations

data.text:
All of the resort was very clean and well-maintained, staff all helpful and friendly, food  choices are very varied abx fresh,the bars and theme restaurants, really good and worth a visit, adult pool is nice and quite if you need a but of peace,
Sports bar is a great space, with A/c fir cool drink
data.title: Great holiday destination
